snippet.title: Beyond Dark Castle for Amiga | Gameplay Only
snippet.description:
Gameplay of Beyond Dark Castle for Amiga. 
In this video I venture through the Computer Room, the Clock Tower and the Swamp in search of the Orb!

I originally recorded this video to show some online friends what the Amiga version of this game looks like. To be honest, this is my favorite version of Beyond Dark Castle that isn't on the Mac. The controls and aiming are not as tight as the Mac version, but once you get used to it, it's definitely a playable version!
